automoderator-config-validator-array-too:
Error returned by validator of AutoModerator config

$1 is a variable name, $2 is the number of maximum allowed items.
automoderator-config-validator-contentmo: Error returned by validator of AutoModerator Config.
automoderator-config-validator-datatype-:
Error returned by validator of AutoModerator Config

$1 is a variable name, $2 and $3 are data types.
automoderator-wiki-report-false-positive: Link that will take users to the AutoModerator false positive reporting page
automoderator-wiki-revert-message-header:
Message header used by AutoModerator on a user's talk page to notify them that their edit has been reverted.

* $1 is the current month
*$2 is the current year
*$3 is AutoModerator username
automoderator-wiki-revert-message:
Message used by AutoModerator on a user's talk page to notify them that their edit has been reverted.

* $1 is the AutoModerator username
* $2 is the revision id
* $3 is the page title where the revision was made
* $4 is the false positive reporting page
automoderator-wiki-revert-message-help-p:
The final bullet point of the talk page message AutoModerator sends.
* $1 is the help page
automoderator-wiki-revert-message-follow:
Message used by AutoModerator on a user's talk page to notify them that another edit they made on the same month has been reverted.

* $1 is the revision id
* $2 is the page title where the revision was made
automoderator-wiki-revert-edit-summary: Edit summary used by AutoModerator on a user's talk page to notify that their edit has been reverted. $1 is the page title where the revert occurred.
automoderator-wiki-revertpage-nouser:
Summary message shown after rollbacking when the username of the version is hidden with RevisionDelete.

In other cases, the message {{msg-mw|Revertpage}} or {{msg-mw|Revertpage-anon}} is used.

Parameters:
* $1 - username of the author of the edit that is being restored
* $7 - the number of edits that have been reverted

These parameters are passed, but not used in the message ([https://phabricator.wikimedia.org/T337092 T337092]):
* $2 - username of the author of the edits that are being reverted
* $3 - revision ID of the revision reverted to
* $4 - timestamp of the revision reverted to
* $5 - revision ID of the revision reverted from
* $6 - timestamp of the revision reverted from

See also:
* {{msg-mw|Revertpage}}
* {{msg-mw|Revertpage-anon}}
automoderator-wiki-revertpage-anon:
Summary message shown after rollbacking anonymous user's edits.

Parameters:
* $1 - username of the author of the edit that is being restored
* $2 - username of the author of the edits that are being reverted
* $7 - the number of edits that have been reverted

These parameters are passed, but not used in the message ([https://phabricator.wikimedia.org/T337092 T337092]):
* $3 - revision ID of the revision reverted to
* $4 - timestamp of the revision reverted to
* $5 - revision ID of the revision reverted from
* $6 - timestamp of the revision reverted from

See also:
* {{msg-mw|Revertpage}}
* {{msg-mw|Revertpage-nouser}}
{{Identical|Revert}}
automoderator-wiki-revertpage:
Summary message shown after rollbacking.

Parameters:
* $1 - username of the author of the edit that is being restored
* $2 - username of the author of the edits that are being reverted
* $7 - the number of edits that have been reverted

These parameters are passed, but not used in the message ([https://phabricator.wikimedia.org/T337092 T337092]):
* $3 - revision ID of the revision reverted to
* $4 - timestamp of the revision reverted to
* $5 - revision ID of the revision reverted from
* $6 - timestamp of the revision reverted from

See also:
* {{msg-mw|Revertpage-anon}}
* {{msg-mw|Revertpage-nouser}}
{{Identical|Revert}}

Description for enabling sending the talk page message field on the community configuration form for AutoModerator that includes links to system messages as well as translate wiki.
